SEARCH
Package net.issachanzi.resteasy.controller

Interface Controller

All Known Implementing Classes:
EasyController
public interface Controller
A mapping between HTTP requests and actions performed by the model

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete(UUID id, String authorization)
    Handles an incoming DELETE request
    String
    get(String authorization)
    Handles an incoming GET request with no query parameters and no model instance id given
    String

    Handles an incoming GET request with query parameters given

    Handles an incoming GET request with an id of a model instance given

  • Method Details

    • get

      String get(String authorization) throws HttpErrorStatus
      Handles an incoming GET request with no query parameters and no model instance id given
      Parameters:
      authorization - The value of the HTTP Authorization header
      Returns:
      The response body to return to the client
      Throws:
      HttpErrorStatus - If the request is not successful

    • get

      String get(Map<String,String> params, String authorization) throws HttpErrorStatus
      Handles an incoming GET request with query parameters given
      Parameters:
      params - A map of the HTTP query parameters
      authorization - The value of the HTTP Authorization header
      Returns:
      The response body to return to the client
      Throws:
      HttpErrorStatus - If the request is not successful

    • get

      String get(UUID id, String authorization) throws HttpErrorStatus
      Handles an incoming GET request with an id of a model instance given
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the model instance requested
      authorization - The value of the HTTP Authorization header
      Returns:
      The response body to return to the client
      Throws:
      HttpErrorStatus - If the request is not successful

    • post

      String post(String body, String authorization) throws HttpErrorStatus
      Handles an incoming POST request
      Parameters:
      body - The request body
      authorization - The value of the HTTP Authorization header
      Returns:
      The response body to return to the client
      Throws:
      HttpErrorStatus - If the request is not successful

    • post

      String post(UUID id, String methodName, String body, String authorization) throws HttpErrorStatus
      Handles an incoming POST request with an id and custom method name given
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the model instance to invoke a method on
      methodName - The name of the custom method to invoke
      body - The request body
      authorization - The value of the HTTP Authorization header
      Returns:
      The response body to return to the client
      Throws:
      HttpErrorStatus - If the request is not successful

    • put

      void put(UUID id, String body, String authorization) throws HttpErrorStatus
      Handles an incoming PUT request
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the model instance to update
      body - The request body
      authorization - The value of the HTTP Authorization header
      Throws:
      HttpErrorStatus - If the request is not successful

    • delete

      void delete(UUID id, String authorization) throws HttpErrorStatus
      Handles an incoming DELETE request
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the model instance to update
      authorization - The value of the HTTP Authorization header
      Throws:
      HttpErrorStatus - If the request is not successful
